title: Smart Data Models - VoltageCompensatorDynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Voltage compensator function block whose behaviour is described by reference to a standard model

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be VoltageCompensatorDynamics

ExcitationSystemDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation system model with which this voltage compensator is associated. Default: None

RemoteInputSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Remote input signal used by this voltage compensator model. Default: None
